quiz.description: Test your understanding of ISO 27001 requirements and implementation

questions.question: What document lists all the controls selected for implementation and justifies inclusions and exclusions?
questions.explanation: The Statement of Applicability (SoA) documents all controls selected for implementation and provides justification for both included and excluded controls from Annex A.

questions.question: Which phase of the PDCA cycle involves implementing security controls and training staff?
questions.explanation: The Do phase involves implementing and operating the ISMS, including implementing selected controls and conducting staff training.

questions.question: What is the primary focus of ISO 27001?
questions.explanation: ISO 27001's primary focus is on establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually improving an Information Security Management System (ISMS).
